posts.title: My First Post
posts.body: Smooth like butter, like a criminal undercover Gon' pop like trouble breaking into your heart like that (ooh) Cool shade, stunner, yeah, I owe it all to my mother, uh Hot like summer, yeah, I'm making you sweat like that (break it down!)

posts.title: My 2nd Post
posts.body: Ooh, when I look in the mirror I'll melt your heart into two I got that superstar glow, so Ooh (do the boogie, like)!

posts.title: My 3rd Post
posts.body: A side step, right-left, to my beat High like the moon, rock with me, baby Know that I got that heat Let me show you 'cause talk is cheap Side step, right-left, to my beat Get it, let it roll!

posts.title: My 4th Post
posts.body: SUGA : Ice on my wrist, I'm the nice guy Got the right body and the right mind Rolling up the party, got the right vibe Smooth like (butter), hate us (love us) Fresh boy, pull up and we lay low All the players get moving when the bass low Got ARMY right behind us when we say so Let's go!

posts.title: Edit post
posts.body: I just wanted to edit this post!
